questions.question: The maximum value of power factor is _______. ?

explanations.c: he power factor is unity when the circuit is purely resistive The maximum value of the power factor is unity (1) The power factor for a purely resistive load is unity (1)The power factor for RL load is less than unity (1) and is lagging in nature • The power factor for RC load is also less than unity (1) but leading in nature

questions.question: . A capacitor with reactance of 3 Ω is connected in series with a resistor of 4 Ω across a supply frequency of 50 Hz. Find the power factor?
